features: 【All-in-One Organic Feminine Oil 】BASSI yoni oil is for your daily vaginal health and optimal hygiene needs. Our intimate oil formulated by our certified herbalist, this fusion of natural essential oils helps maintain Ph balance for women, soothes skin, ease discomfort, irritation and itchiness, keeps your skin moisturized, gently cleanses, stimulates and moisturizes the feminine area, leaving it supple and free of any odors. And keeps your V smelling like fresh strawberry fruits.

【PH Balance Daily Intimate Wash】 BASSI organic yoni bar soap for women a healthy vaginal pH is acidic, somewhere between 3.8 to 4.5. Our feminine wash bar for women have a healthy pH of 4.5 to 5 so you can feel confident, comfortable, and healthy. Use with confidence as it enhances your natural pH to prevent irritation.

【Fragrance-free Feminine Wash】 BASSI feminine wash designed for vagina and is free from dyes & parabens & harmful chemicals to give you a simple, ph-balancing formula infused with kinds of natural extracts. Yoni wash for women with no sulfates, dyes or fragrances. That will help you keep your most sensitive area clean, fresh, and protected all day long.

【Improve Feminine Intimate Elasticity】BASSI yoni oil feminine care oil is rich in antioxidants and provides effective relief from dryness, itch and remove odor resulting from workouts and menstruation while also promoting skin tone / elasticity and eliminating odor, sweetening your sacred petals with the fresh and clean fragrance.

【Moisturizing & Smoothing】 BASSI yoni care set that feminine vaginal oil, yoni soap bar and yoni wash blend will help promote your skin and vaginal moisturized and hydrated throughout the day while helping reduce the effects of irritation, flaky skin and vaginal dryness and pH balanced along with leaving behind a subtle refreshing scent

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars 2 out of 3 isn’t bad
reviews.reviewText: 🍃The soap portions (both the bar and liquid) smells pleasant and works well as intended to. The oil, however I found super greasy and caused my face to break out. It did not seem to absorb well into my skin and just left a layer on top.It was greasy and uncomfortable so I had to wipe it off. I may be just using it for my dry skin on my dry feet and cracked heels and then putting socks on so I don’t leave a greasy trail like a slug. 👍👍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It’s great for your flower. Your mate will love it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Like the smell no real change
reviews.reviewText: I don't see a difference in my pH Balance with this product but I like the smell. I am not a fan of bar soap so the liquid was my immediate go to. I will reorder but in a different scent. If you pair it with the Honey Pot liner/pad after "maintenance" it gives a little tingling sensation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars I didn't like this set
reviews.reviewText: I recently tried a Yoni oil kit, which consisted of 3 different oils and like it so much that I decided to try another kit. Upon receiving this I realized I should have just reordered the previous set. I didn't like the smell nor consistency of this gel based wash. I was more interested in the oils to be honest but they too were a let down. They each came with a rose or leaf of some sort in the bottle but once I opened the bottle the smell wasn't appealing so I decided against using them as well. I saw another reviewer mention using hers as cuticle oil so that's an option I guess.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Don’t buy this soap . It does not have a smell maybe a very light smell before you use it but once you use it, you cannot smell anything. The soap does have a good lather, but it has no smell. The oil is weak so it’s not an oil the body wash I have not used yet because it’s not a very good product so I don’t think the body wash would be good either
